title: Helpp D: League Client has stopped working
body: Every time I try to play league this pops up League Client has stopped working I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling Repair Restoring my computer to a later date ( my usually solution to computer problems ) but none of it worked so this is my cry for help pls help{{summoner:7}}

replies.body:
The popup you're mentioning is a windows error message. This message usually occurs when your client disconnects from the game platform service entirely, usually due to an *unstable connection* to our servers. Since you're seeing this, I'd suggest taking a look at our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for steps that may resolve this issue entirely.

Let me know if this helped.

Well thats not very specific, do you mean the program just wont open at all? or you can log in but the game crashes when you enter a match?

I am going to assume the latter is your problem because it usually is, so first off update your graphics drivers and also check out this [link](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) which is to the riot help page for such issues, run though it and see if your problems gone or not.
